data.title: Summitville, Indiana Population 2024
data.text:
Summitville is a city located in Delaware County and Madison County Indiana. Summitville has a 2024 population of 993. Summitville is currently growing at a rate of 0.2% annually and its population has increased by 0.81% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 985 in 2020.

The average household income in Summitville is $62,620 with a poverty rate of 15.87% . The median age in Summitville is 39.4 years: 39.8 years for males, and 35.8 years for females.

Summitville Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Summitville was:

White : 94.99%

Two or more races : 3.67%

Black or African American : 1.07%

Other race : 0.27%

Native American : 0%

Asian : 0%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0%
